name: Toilet Paper Shopping Simulator
description:
Toilet Paper Shopping Simulator rush to get those Toilet Papers!

How To Play:

Use Arrow Key to Steer the shopping cart, use mouse drag to launch the toilet paper, in the direction of drag.

The version on itch io is the pre-censor version, as reviewer on other platform think it's too sensitive for the current event. so I wanted to release a uncensored version before I censor it for other platform.

Any purchases would help me out greatly. I want to add a leader board, if it can sell over 500 copies to cover the cost for adding this game to steam to use the leader board system.
